plays.text: Penalty to Ales Kotalik 2 minutes for Elbowing Scott Ferguson
Penalty to Steve Staios 2 minutes for Crosschecking Curtis Brown
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by J.P. Dumont
Penalty to Ryan Smyth 2 minutes for Hooking Curtis Brown
Penalty to J.P. Dumont 2 minutes for Roughing Steve Staios
Penalty to Ryan Smyth 2 minutes for Holding Tim Connolly
Goal scored by Janne Niinimaa assisted by Georges Laraque and Jiri Dopita
Penalty to Adam Mair 2 minutes for Boarding Janne Niinimaa
Penalty to Vaclav Varada 2 minutes for Charging Marty Reasoner
Penalty to Alexei Zhitnik 2 minutes for High Sticking Jiri Dopita
Penalty to Josh Green 2 minutes for Slashing Curtis Brown
Goal scored by Dmitri Kalinin assisted by Jochen Hecht and Chris Gratton
Penalty to Todd Marchant 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Eric Boulton
Penalty to Alexei Zhitnik 2 minutes for High Sticking(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Alexei Zhitnik 2 minutes for High Sticking(opposing player not identified) served by J.P. Dumont
